game.game_update_error: An error occurred during game update.

keystore.no_keystore_error: [Dispatch] No SSL cert found! Falling back to HTTP server.
keystore.default_password: [Dispatch] The default keystore password was loaded successfully. Please consider setting the password to 123456 in config.json.

authentication.default_unable_to_verify: [Authentication] Something called the verifyUser method which is unavailable in the default authentication handler.

dispatch.no_commands_error: Commands are not supported in dispatch only mode.

account.login_attempt: [Dispatch] Client %s is trying to log in.
account.login_max_player_limit: [Dispatch] Client %s failed to log in: The number of online players has reached the limit
account.login_token_attempt: [Dispatch] Client %s is trying to log in via token.
account.login_token_error: [Dispatch] Client %s failed to log in via token.
account.login_token_success: [Dispatch] Client %s logged in via token as %s.
account.login_password_error: [Dispatch] Client %s failed to log in via password.
account.login_password_storage_error: [Dispatch] Client %s failed to log in via password because there is no password in the database.
account.combo_token_success: [Dispatch] Client %s succeed to exchange combo token.
account.combo_token_error: [Dispatch] Client %s failed to exchange combo token.
account.account_login_create_success: [Dispatch] Client %s failed to log in: Account %s created.
account.account_login_create_error: [Dispatch] Client %s failed to log in: Account create failed.
account.account_login_exist_error: [Dispatch] Client %s failed to log in: Account not found.
account.password_length_error: Password length must be greater then or equal to 8
account.password_storage_error: You don't have a password for your account. Please contact an administrator.
account.server_max_player_limit: The number of online players has reached the limit

status.free_software: Grasscutter is FREE software. If you have paid for this, you may have been scammed. Homepage: https://github.com/Grasscutters/Grasscutter
status.run_mode_help: Server run mode must be 'HYBRID', 'DISPATCH_ONLY', or 'GAME_ONLY'. Unable to start Grasscutter...
status.resources_error: Place a copy of 'BinOutput' and 'ExcelBinOutput' in the resources folder.

resources.missing_server: To fully use questing, it is recommended to add the 'Server' folder.
resources.missing_scenes: To fully use questing, it is recommended to add the 'ScriptSceneData' folder.

generic.permission_error: You do not have permission to run this command.
generic.console_execute_error: This command can only be run from the console.

invalid.value_between: Invalid value: %s must be between %s and %s.

execution.player_exist_offline_error: Player not found or is not online.
execution.set_target: Subsequent commands will target @%s by default.
execution.set_target_online: @%s is online. Some commands may require an offline target.
execution.set_target_offline: @%s is offline. Some commands may require an online target.
execution.need_target: This command requires a target UID. Add a <@UID> argument or set a persistent target with /target @UID.
execution.need_target_online: This command requires an online target UID, but current target is offline. Add a different <@UID> argument or set a persistent target with /target @UID.
execution.need_target_offline: This command requires an offline target UID, but current target is online. Add a different <@UID> argument or set a persistent target with /target @UID.

account.exists: An account with this username and/or UID already exists.

announce.send_success: Send an announcement successfully, you can revoke it by /a revoke %s.
announce.description: Send announcement to all online players, or manage server's announcement

clear.description: Deletes unequipped unlocked items from your inventory. Defaults to 4* level 1 refinement 1 or lower, but can be set higher.

coop.description: Forces someone to join the world of others. If no one is targeted, it sends you into co-op mode anyway.

enter_dungeon.in_dungeon_error: You are already in that dungeon.

give.illegal_relic: This artifactID belongs to a blacklisted range, it may not be the one you wanted.
give.given_with_level_and_refinement: Given %s with level %s, refinement %s %s times to %s.
give.description: Gives an item to you or the specified player. Can also give all weapons, avatars and/or materials, and can construct custom artifacts.

heal.description: Heal all characters in your current team.

help.tip_permission_targeted: (Permission %s is also required to use on other players)
help.warn_player_has_no_permission: Notice: You do not have permission to run this command.
help.description: Sends the help message or shows information about a specified command

kick.description: Kicks the specified player from the server (WIP)

killall.scene_not_found_in_player_world: Scene not found in player world.

language.language_not_found: Currently, the server does not have that language.

permission.description: Grants or removes a permission for a user

resetConst.success: Constellations for %s have been reset. Please relog to see changes.
resetConst.description: Resets the constellation level on your current active character, you will need to relog after using the command to see any changes

resetShopLimit.description: Reset target player's shop refresh time

sendMail.user_not_exist: The user with an ID of '%s' does not exist.
sendMail.start_composition:
Starting composition of message.
Please use '/sendmail <title>' to continue.
You can use '/sendmail stop' at any time.
sendMail.not_composition_end:
Message composition not at final stage.
Please use '/sendmail %s' or '/sendmail stop' to cancel
sendMail.set_title:
Message title set as '%s'.
Use '/sendmail <content>' to continue.
sendMail.set_contents:
Message contents set as '%s'.
Use '/sendmail <sender>' to continue.
sendMail.set_message_sender:
Message sender set as '%s'.
Use '/sendmail <itemID|itemName|finish> [amount] [level]' to continue.
sendMail.send:
Attached %s of %s (level %s) to the message.
Continue adding more items or use '/sendmail finish' to send the message.
sendMail.title: <title>
sendMail.error: ERROR: Invalid construction stage %s. Check console for stacktrace.
sendMail.description: Sends mail to the specified user. The usage of this command changes based on its composition state

sendMessage.description: Sends a message to a player as the server. If used with no target, sends to all players on the server.

setConst.range_error: Constellation level must be between 0 and 6.
setConst.failed_success: Constellations for %s have been set to %s. Please reload scene to see changes.
setConst.success: Constellations for %s have been set to %s.
setConst.successall: Constellations for all characters have been set to %s.
setConst.description: Sets constellation level for your current active character

setFetterLevel.range_error: Fetter level must be between 0 and 10.
setFetterLevel.description: Sets your fetter level for your current active character

setProp.description:
Sets accountwide properties. Things like godmode can be enabled this way, as well as changing things like unlocked abyss floor and battle pass progress.
	Values for <prop> (case-insensitive): GodMode | UnlimitedStamina | UnlimitedEnergy | TowerLevel | WorldLevel | BPLevel | SetOpenState | UnsetOpenState | UnlockMap
	(cont.) see PlayerProperty enum for other possible values, of the form PROP_MAX_SPRING_VOLUME -> max_spring_volume

setSceneTag.description: Sets account-specific scene tags. This controls things like rocks blocking doors, buildings being visible, and other (usually quest-related) things that affect what is visible in your world.

setStats.description:
Sets fight property for your current active character
	Values for <stat>: hp | maxhp | def | atk | em | er | crate | cdmg | cdr | heal | heali | shield | defi
	(cont.) Elemental DMG Bonus: epyro | ecryo | ehydro | egeo | edendro | eelectro | ephys
	(cont.) Elemental RES: respyro | rescryo | reshydro | resgeo | resdendro | reselectro | resphys

spawn.limit_reached: Scene spawn limit reached. Spawning %s entities instead.

talent.out_of_range: Invalid talent level. Level should be in range of 1-15.
talent.description: Set talent level for your current active character

team.add_too_much: The server only allows you to have at most %s avatar(s) in your team.
team.remove_too_much: You can't remove all your avatars.
team.index_out_of_range: The index you specified is out of range.

teleportAll.success: Summoned all players to your location.
teleportAll.error: You can only use this command in MP mode.
teleportAll.description: Teleports all players in your world to your position

teleport.exists_error: The specified scene does not exist.

trialAvatarActivity.description: Manipulate functionalities of Trial Avatar Activity. This includes toggling dungeon and reward states.
trialAvatarActivity.not_found: Trial avatar activity player data not found. Maybe the activity is not enabled.

weather.success: Set weather ID to %s with climate type %s.
weather.status: Current weather ID is %s with climate type %s.
weather.description:
Changes weather ID and climate type. Weather IDs can be found in ./Resources/ExcelBinOutput/WeatherExcelConfigData.json.
Climate types: sunny, cloudy, rain, thunderstorm, snow, mist

unlockall.description: Unlocks all open states for a player.

info.description: Provides the sender information about the server.

plugin.invalid_config: Plugin %s has an invalid config file.
plugin.invalid_main_class: Plugin %s has an invalid main class.
plugin.missing_config: Plugin %s lacks a valid config file.
plugin.failed_to_load_dependencies: Failed to load plugins with dependencies.

invalid_api.not_present: Plugin %s does not specify an API version.
invalid_api.lower: Plugin %s is using API version %s, while the server is using API version %s.
invalid_api.outdated: Plugin %s is using an outdated API method.
